 Formula-building rule for restricted existential quantifier (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.)
statement:
rexbidv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rexbidv $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps <-> E. x e. A ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
